name: Mt Lady [My Hero Academia] Character LoRA
description:
Mt. Lady from My Hero Academia - Character LoRA

If you like what I create, feel free to support on Ko-Fi!🍵

Make sure to leave a review if you like it, would love to see all the pictures everyone creates!

My third character LoRA I have done, Mt Lady! Trained on the NovelAI model, and tested with many different anime specific models such as AOM3, AOM2_Hard, NovelAI, Anything v4.5, Midnight Mixers, Based64Mixv-V3, and a few others. This LoRA definitely can produce images of Mt Lady in her Hero outfit very well. However, you can also feel free to generate her in other outfits, such as a tank top and shorts in one of my example images. I found that this LoRA works well with a weight of 0.9 - 1. I have generally found a weight of 1 works perfectly fine in all circumstances. Have found a CFG between 7-9 works well, along with Step around 25-30, but feel free to experiment! Also Clip Skip of 2.

  • Triggers are: mtladymha and boku no hero academia

  • Description Tags that may help: bodysuit, pink eyes, domino mask, long hair, blonde hair, horns,

modelVersions.name: v1.0
